[Contact Us](https://sporeworks.com/Liquid-Culture-Syringes/#) [Contact Us Form](https://sporeworks.com/Liquid-Culture-Syringes/help.php?section=contactus) [(802-444-0111)](tel:(8024440111)) [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/official.sporeworks/) [Special](https://sporeworks.com/Liquid-Culture-Syringes/#) [Products Map](https://sporeworks.com/Liquid-Culture-Syringes/products_map.php) [Sitemap](https://sporeworks.com/Liquid-Culture-Syringes/sitemap.php) [Help Zone](https://sporeworks.com/Liquid-Culture-Syringes/help.php) [Catalog](https://sporeworks.com/Liquid-Culture-Syringes/# "Catalog") [Search](https://sporeworks.com/Liquid-Culture-Syringes/# "Search") [My Account](https://sporeworks.com/Liquid-Culture-Syringes/# "My Account") [0Your Cart](https://sporeworks.com/Liquid-Culture-Syringes/cart.php "Your Cart") # Liquid Culture Syringes ![Liquid Culture Syringes](https://sporeworks.com/images/C/culture-syringe-final-0005_400.png) Mushroom culture and mycelium available as living tissue in a nutrient solution supplied in 10cc Luer-Lok syringes. Culture syringes are guaranteed fresh, in stock, and are ready to ship. Each culture will be supplied with sterility packaged 1.5in 16ga needle. Need suggestions? Check out the Bestsellers box for the most desired varieties in each category.
